headline: NRG Energy, Inc. (NRG): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on NRG Energy, Inc. on X.com by @TheValueist. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on NRG. NRG Energy, Inc.’s share was trading at $149.48 as of December 17th. NRG’s trailing and forward P/E were 22.34 and 16.89 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. NRG Energy, Inc., together with its subsidiaries, […]

headline: UBS:  NRG Energy, Inc. (NRG) is a Buy on Compelling free Cash Flow, Strategic Positioning, and Differentiated Growth Drivers
summary: NRG Energy Inc. (NYSE:NRG) is one of billionaire David Tepper’s top stock picks heading into 2026. On December 9, UBS initiated coverage of NRG Energy Inc. (NYSE:NRG) with a Buy rating and a $211 price target. The research firm remains confident about the company’s prospects owing to its compelling free cash flow, strategic positioning, and […]
